original_text: Neither can they die any more: for they are equal unto the angels; and are the children of God, being the children of the resurrection.
korean_text: 그들은 다시 죽을 수도 없나니 이는 천사와 동등이요 부활의 자녀로서 하나님의 자녀임이라

sentences.original_text: Neither can they die any more
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 죽을 수도 없고

sentences.original_text: for they are equal unto the angels
and are the children of God
being the children of the resurrection
